tool_description: Calibrates DC current measurement ranges by applying precise reference currents and measuring DUT response, accounting for burden voltage effects and current shunt accuracy.

test_points.description: Current test points as percentage of range

burden_voltage_check.description: Whether to measure input burden voltage

error_messages: Current source overload: Reference current source cannot deliver required current level.
Excessive burden voltage: DUT input burden voltage exceeds acceptable limits for accurate measurement.
Current instability: Reference current shows excessive drift or noise during measurement.
Shunt heating effect: Current shunt temperature rise affecting measurement accuracy.
Range switching error: DUT fails to switch current ranges properly during testing.
Insufficient test points: Minimum 4 test points required per current range.
Current range not supported: Specified current range exceeds calibration system capabilities.
usage: Select current ranges and test points to calibrate. Optionally enable burden voltage checking. Tool applies reference currents and evaluates DUT current measurement accuracy.

current_errors.description: Measurement errors for each current test point

burden_voltages.description: Measured burden voltages for each range

linearity_error.description: Maximum linearity error across measurement range
